title: Potential Buffer Overflow in SHGetFolderPath
description: The function SHGetFolderPath is used to retrieve the path of a special folder, but it does not check if the buffer provided is large enough. This can lead to a buffer overflow if the path exceeds MAX_PATH characters.
fix: Use the newer SHGetKnownFolderPath function which provides a way to specify the size of the buffer and returns the actual length of the path.
